title: Extreme Lag
body:
Hey

I seem to be writing a post every year about the same thing. The ping from Beijing is always around 400 stable and occasionally 170 without VPN/Proxy. I would switch to Chinese servers but I've spent wayyy to much money on OCE and shit. Riot hasn't given a fix for the past 5 years aye. Or at least any reasoning behind the instability of connection. 

Cheers

replies.body: Cheers for the help this year lads
